body:
Add a new package for openPMD-api.

openPMD is a meta-data standard (markup, schema) for hierarchical, scientific particle and mesh based data.

openPMD-api is a library wrapping the underlying backends ([HDF5](hierarchical), [ADIOS](https://github.com/ornladios/ADIOS), ...) into a single, object-aware API.

* Repository: https://github.com/openPMD/openPMD-api
* Project: https://github.com/openPMD http://www.openPMD.org
title: openPMD-api
